page.title: 11LEISURE 1
page.content:
{I LIKE JOGGING "I like jogging because it keeps me healthy;I go jogging with my sister every day.I run because I like running and would like to run a marathon one day, when I'm older. I like swimming and skating too. I like any kind of sport really." Tina Hicks Aged 10
{BMXing "My bike is a Team Murry.It cost 150 pounds and weighs 10 lbs. It is silver with blue tyres and black hand grips I can jump 3 metres off a 124 inch ramp.I belong to sandhurst BMX club. My ambition is to ride with Bob Haro as I am a great fan of his and would like to win the British Championship". Matthew Whale Aged 10
